titleStmt.title: The famous history of the rise and fall of Massaniello in two parts / written by Mr. Tho. D'Urfey.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Second part has special t.p.: The famous history and fall of Massainello, or, A fisherman a prince. 1699.
Based in part on the "Rebellion of Naples", 1649. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Pages 30-52 of part 1 from Bodleian Library copy spliced at end.
